name: Master Thief
description:
Hello, this is my submission for Game a Week 2018! This week's prompt was camerawork, which was a tricky one! Unfortunately this week I didn't get a heap of time to work on it, so this week's project is a little buggy and ugly! Sorry about that! Also sorry for uploading it about four days late :P I'll have another project up by the end of the week! And since you can't see them very well the screenshots for this game is what's in the paintings.

In this project I used Ben Esposito's amazing character controller! I adapted the code shoddily so excuse that, the proper working controller can be found here! I've used it many times in the past and it's a delight to use. http://torahhorse.com/first-person-drifter-controller-for-unity3d
